eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A HAZARDOUS MATERIALS WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Adams, NE; AT 02:36 PM ON NOV 17, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 04:06 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THERE IS AN ANHYDROUS LEAK SOUTH OF HIGWAY 6 ON J STREET. IF YOU SMELL AN ODOR, SEEK SHELTER INDOORS. SEEK SHELTER INDOORS AND SHELTER IN PLACE IF YOU SMELL STRONG ODORS.
